message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. Let's find a middle ground â€“ how about $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so how about $10,250?
